text:
January 22
1959
Mr* Marshall McLuhan
Culture and Communications Seminar
29 Wells Hill Avenue
Toronto 10, Ontario/ Canada
Dear Marshall:
Have submitted proposal to several for ideas. May need to talk by
phone next week/ when I have to finalize it.
Here are reactions of Henry Cassirer/ of UNESCO. Guess you were
right at first to keep it "all modern media." My problem is to get
it to qualify under a new media (only) grant.
In a rush. Off to Chicago but will be in the office all week. Call
(collect, if necessary) as early in the week, if possible. Our
phone is Empire 7-6611, Extension 3394.
Sincerely,
hjs:rs
Enclosures
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
